metadata.description: Complete character skill system with attributes, combat, magic, and professions

items.name: Sleight of Hand
items.description: Quick fingers for pickpocketing and manipulation

items.name: Arcana
items.description: Knowledge of magical theory and phenomena

items.name: Nature
items.description: Knowledge of plants, animals, and natural world

items.name: History
items.description: Knowledge of past events, cultures, and lore

items.name: Perception
items.description: Noticing details and spotting hidden things

items.name: Survival
items.description: Wilderness knowledge, tracking, and enduring harsh conditions

items.name: Persuasion
items.description: Convincing others through reason and charm

items.name: Axes
items.description: Hand axes, battleaxes, and great axes

items.name: Arcane
items.description: Core arcane magic skill - study-based spellcasting

items.name: Divine
items.description: Core divine magic skill - faith-based spellcasting

magic_occult.description: Occult magic tradition - Mind and shadow magic

items.name: Occult
items.description: Core occult magic skill - mental spellcasting

items.name: Primal
items.description: Core primal magic skill - nature-based spellcasting

items.name: Elementalism
items.description: Fire, ice, lightning, and earth magic

items.name: Blacksmithing
items.description: Forging weapons and armor from metal

items.name: Woodworking
items.description: Crafting bows, staves, and wooden items

items.name: Mining
items.description: Extracting ore and gems from rocks
